question: What does EOFIS mean?
answer: Eo Fis is an Old Irish phrase meaning the Salmon of Knowledge, a legendary salmon who, when eaten, would give anyone access to all the world's knowledge.

question: I like what I see. How can I invest/find out more?
answer: Contact us!! We want to talk to you. You can use the contact form above or reach out to us directly at one of the following emails: marysol@eofis.ie or tiarnach@eofis.ie

question: This looks really interesting! How can I get started using Eofis?
answer: The Eofis team are busy building the application for you. We are on track to having an MVP created before December 2022. Please use the contact form above and let us know if you want to try it out!
